department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Fortunes of a Genre: The Western
course.meeting_text: Tu. 1-3 and a weekly film screening Tu., 7-9pm
course.description: Studies American westerns through appreciation of genre theory and history with emphasis on French reception. Includes films of Boetticher, Dwan, De Toth, Ford, Fuller, Hawks, Hellman, Lang, Mann, Ray, Vidor, Walsh, et al.
course.notes: This course has an additional weekly film screening, Tu., 7 pm-9 pm.
